attributes.action: Make it a legal right to be able to criticise immigration.
attributes.additional_details: People of this country must be freely able to speak out against immigration and oppose it and that right should be enshrined in law as part of our laws on freedom of speach and this UN proposal must not be able to thwart people’s opposition to immigration.
attributes.background: Britain will sign United Nations proposal to make immigration a human right, in so doing it could make criticism or speaking out against immigration illegal and a hate crime.
